properties.property: select t.orgid, t.orgname, t.orgcode, t.leve dwleve, other.id, other.bgddlx, other.wljrfs, other.pcsszxm, other.pcsszsfzh, other.pcsszjh, other.pcsfszxm, other.pcsfszsfzh, other.pcsfszjh, other.czrxm, other.czrdwdm, other.czrdwmc, to_char(other.czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as czsj, other.szjxcjl, other.jjjl, other.jgjl, other.xjjl, other.tjjl, other.xjjxcjl, other.jdxldys, other.pcsfjs, other.jwspbfjs, other.jb, other.lb, other.dj, other.szjb, other.bzs, other.jwmsd, other.jwmss, other.dsmc1, other.dsmc2, other.dsmc3, other.dsmc4, other.zbmsb, other.zbmsl, other.zbjc, other.zbrsjl, other.zbrslds, other.zbrsfjs, other.xzjd, other.szsfjrxzbz, other.zzsqmjs, other.sqmjzjlb, other.sqmjrjpbfjs, other.xqmj, other.zdcss, to_char(other.djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as djsj, other.pcsjwqdj, other.szzj, other.drsznx, other.rjgyjfbz, other.sjbfdw, other.fhzb, other.hjsj, other.hjry, other.qtry, other.jwqs, other.ywjws, other.dnts, other.jtgj, other.bgdd, other.jrganw, other.jrww, other.qtfhzb, other.dzid, other.dzmc, other.sfncjws, other.dsmc5, other.qcs, other.djzbs, other.fdtks, other.fdbxs, other.fcbxs, other.syjls, other.sfstpz, other.sfjljws, tj.zjls jls, -- 警力数 tj.pcszfjs fjs, -- 辅警数 tj.JSQJWSS sqjwss, -- 社区警务室数 tj.sqmjs , -- 社区民警数 tj.ncjwss, -- 农村警务室数 tj.zcmjs, -- 驻村民警数 tj.sqjwsfjs sqmjpbfjs, -- 社区警务室辅警数 F_GET_GXXZSQCCOUNT(t.orgcode) sqs, --社区数 F_GET_XZCSCOUNT(t.orgcode) xzcs, --行政村数 (select czrks from t_common_xqtjqk where orgcode = t.orgcode) hjrks, --户籍人口数 (select ldrks from t_common_xqtjqk where orgcode = t.orgcode) zzrks, --暂住人口数 (select zddxs from t_common_xqtjqk where orgcode = t.orgcode) zddxs, --重点对象数 (select dwzs from t_common_xqtjqk where orgcode = t.orgcode) zddws --重点单位数 from t_common_organization_sjjs t left join t_common_organization_other other on other.orgcode = t.orgcode left join t_common_pcsjbqktjb tj on tj.orgcode = t.orgcode where t.leve=4 #if($sfwsxx && $sfwsxx.equals("1")) and (dj is not null and lb is not null and jb is not null) #elseif($sfwsxx && $sfwsxx.equals("0")) and (dj is null or lb is null or jb is null) #end #if($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end order by jb

select nvl(a.orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode , replace(replace(replace(nvl(a.orgname,'合计'),'公安局',''),'市局','市'),'自治州','州') as orgname, a.leve,a.parent_code as parentcode, zjls, pcszs, pcsjls, pcszfjs, sqjwsfjs, sqjwss, sqmjs, ncjwss, zcmjs, jwslganws, stpzs, pcszfbzfjs, pcsldrkxgys, pcsxfdys, sqjwspbzfbzfjs, sqjwspblkxgys, sqjwspbxfdys, jsqjwss, sqjwslws, ncjwslws,sqzcmjzs,jwszs from ( select orgcode, sum(zjls) as zjls, sum(pcszs) as pcszs, sum(pcsjls) as pcsjls, sum(pcszfjs) as pcszfjs, sum(sqjwsfjs) as sqjwsfjs, sum(sqjwss) as sqjwss, sum(sqmjs) as sqmjs, sum(ncjwss) as ncjwss, sum(zcmjs) as zcmjs, sum(jwslganws) as jwslganws, sum(stpzs) as stpzs, sum(pcszfbzfjs) as pcszfbzfjs, sum(pcsldrkxgys) as pcsldrkxgys, sum(pcsxfdys) as pcsxfdys, sum(sqjwspbzfbzfjs) as sqjwspbzfbzfjs, sum(sqjwspblkxgys) as sqjwspblkxgys, sum(sqjwspbxfdys) as sqjwspbxfdys, sum(jsqjwss) as jsqjwss, sum(sqjwslws) as sqjwslws, sum(ncjwslws) as ncjwslws, sum(sqzcmjzs) as sqzcmjzs,sum(jwszs) as jwszs from t_common_pcsjbqktjb s WHERE s.parentcode = #[parentcode] group by rollup(orgcode) ) s LEFT JOIN t_common_organization_sjjs a ON s.orgcode = a.orgcode ORDER BY sn,a.orgcode

select substr(orgcode,1,4)||'00000000' as sjdm, (select orgjc from v_common_organization where orgcode=substr(t.orgcode,1,4)||'00000000' and isyx='1') as sjmc, substr(orgcode,1,6)||'000000' as fxjdm, (select orgjc from v_common_organization where orgcode=substr(t.orgcode,1,6)||'000000' and isyx='1') as fxjmc, substr(orgcode,1,8)||'0000' as pcsdm, (select orgjc from v_common_organization where orgcode=substr(t.orgcode,1,8)||'0000' and isyx='1') as pcsmc, orgcode as jwqdm, (select orgjc from v_common_organization where orgcode=t.orgcode and isyx='1') as jwqmc, realname, username, sfzh, floor((sysdate - to_date(substr(f_sys_tran_id15to18(sfzh),7,8),'yyyymmdd'))/365) as age, (select nvl(MOBILE,TELEPHONE) from t_common_user_lxfs l where l.USERID=t.userid and rownum<2) lxdh, mobile, (select listagg(JC,',') within group (order by ssjwsdm) from t_common_hnxzqh where ssjwsdm=t.orgcode) as gxsq, (select PCSJWQDJ from t_common_organization_other ot where ot.orgcode=t.orgcode and rownum=1) as jwqdj, (select count(1) from t_common_organization_fj fj where fj.SSDWDM=t.orgcode and zxbs = '0') as pbfjs from ( select u.userid, o.orgcode,u.username,u.realname,u.sfzh,u.mobile from v_common_user u inner join v_common_orguser ou on u.userid=ou.userid inner join v_common_organization o on o.orgid=ou.orgid where o.leve='5' and u.isvalid='1' ) t where 1=1 #if($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and t.orgcode like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end order by orgcode

select ( select count(1) from t_common_organization_sjjs where leve='4' and orgcode like #[suborgcode]||'%' ) as pcssl, ( select count(1) from t_common_organization_sjjs where leve='5' and orgcode like #[suborgcode]||'%' ) as jwqsl, ( select count(1) from v_common_user u inner join v_common_orguser ou on ou.userid=u.userid inner join v_common_organization o on o.orgid=ou.orgid where o.leve='5' and o.orgcode like #[suborgcode]||'%' and o.isyx='1' and u.isvalid='1' ) as sqmjsl from dual

SELECT (select mc from t_common_hnxzqh where dm = #[orgcode]) as title, orgcode, orgname, ( --实有人数 SELECT zjls FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) as syrs, ( --县级公安机关总警力数 SELECT sum(zjls) FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE leve = '3' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS xjgajgzjls,
( --实有警力数占县级公安机关总警力小于40% SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_PCSJBQKTJB S LEFT JOIN (SELECT NVL(SUM(ORG.SYJLS), 0) AS SYJLS, SUBSTR(ORG.ORGCODE, 1, 6) AS CODE FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND org.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND org.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND org.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end GROUP BY SUBSTR(ORG.ORGCODE, 1, 6)) PCSSYJL ON PCSSYJL.CODE = SUBSTR(S.ORGCODE, 1, 6) WHERE S.LEVE = 3 #if($orgLeve == 1) AND s.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND s.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND s.orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND (PCSSYJL.SYJLS / S.ZJLS) < 0.4 ) AS syjlzxjlbl,
( --当年（统计期）接受过集中业务培训的民警数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_USER_LXFS U WHERE 1=1 #if($orgLeve == 1) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND NVL(DNJZYWPXCS, 0) > 0 ) AS cjpxmjs, ( --派出所数（个） SELECT PCSZS FROM T_COMMON_PCSJBQKTJB WHERE ORGCODE = #[orgcode] ) AS pcss, ( --城区户籍所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.LB = '1' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND orgcode LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS cqhjs, ( --20人及以上的城区派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG, T_COMMON_PCSJBQKTJB TJ WHERE ORG.LB = '1' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND TJ.ORGCODE = ORG.ORGCODE AND tj.zjls >= 20 #if($orgLeve == 1) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS cqs, ( -- 建制镇派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.LB = '3' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS zpcs1, ( --10人及以上的建制镇派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG, T_COMMON_PCSJBQKTJB TJ WHERE ORG.LB = '3' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND TJ.ORGCODE = ORG.ORGCODE AND tj.zjls >= 10 #if($orgLeve == 1) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS zpcs2, ( --建制乡派出所数(个) SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.LB = '4' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS xpcs, ( --5人及以上的建制乡派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG, T_COMMON_PCSJBQKTJB TJ WHERE ORG.LB = '4' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND TJ.ORGCODE = ORG.ORGCODE AND tj.zjls >= 5 #if($orgLeve == 1) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND TJ.ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS xpcs2, ( --治安派出所数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.LB = '6' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS zas, ( --水上派出所数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.LB = '5' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS sss, ( --一级派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.DJ = '1' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS yijs, ( --二级派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.DJ = '2' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS erjs, ( --三级派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.DJ = '3' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS sanjs, ( --四级派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.DJ = '4' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS sijs, ( --五级派出所数（个） SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.DJ = '5' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS wujs, ( --汽车（辆） SELECT nvl(SUM(qcs),0) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS qcs, ( --无车派出所数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND (qcs = 0 OR qcs IS NULL) ) AS wcpcs, ( --计算机（台） SELECT nvl(SUM(dnts),0) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS jsjs, ( --无电脑派出所数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND (dnts = 0 OR dnts IS NULL) ) AS wjsjs, ( --副科级以下 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.JB = '1' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fkjyx, ( --副科级 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.JB = '2' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fkj, ( --正科级 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.JB = '3' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS zkj, ( --副处级 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.JB = '4' AND ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fcj,
--副处级以上 0 AS fcjys, ( --防弹头盔（顶） SELECT nvl(SUM(FDTKS),0) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fdtks, ( --未装备防弹头盔的派出所数 SELECT count(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND (FDTKS = 0 OR FDTKS IS NULL) #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS wfdtkpcss, ( --防弹背心（件） SELECT nvl(SUM(FDBXS),0) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fdbxs, ( --未装备防弹背心的派出所数 SELECT count(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND (FDBXS = 0 OR FDBXS IS NULL) #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS wfdbxpcss, ( --防刺背心（件） SELECT nvl(SUM(FCBXS),0) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS fcbxs, ( --未装备防刺背心的派出所数 SELECT count(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND (FCBXS = 0 OR FCBXS IS NULL) #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS wfcbxpcss, ( --所长数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_ORGANIZATION_OTHER ORG WHERE ORG.ISPCS = '1' AND PCSSZJH IS NOT NULL #if($orgLeve == 1) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND ORGCODE LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end ) AS szs, ( --已建农村警务室数（个） SELECT NCJWSS FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) AS ncjwss, ( --驻村民警 SELECT ZCMJS FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) AS zcmjs, ( --驻村民警中专职驻村民警数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_USER_LXFS U WHERE u.sfzcmj = '1' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND u.sfzzsqmj = '1' ) AS zczzmjs, ( --已建社区警务室数（个） SELECT JSQJWSS FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) AS jljwqs, ( --社区民警（人） SELECT SQMJS FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) AS sqmjs, ( --社区民警中专职社区民警数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_COMMON_USER_LXFS U WHERE u.sfzcmj = '0' #if($orgLeve == 1) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 2) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' #elseif($orgLeve == 3) AND U.ORGDWDM LIKE substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' #end AND u.sfzzsqmj = '1' ) AS zzmjs, ( --社区数（个） SELECT F_GET_GXXZSQCCOUNT(#[orgcode]) FROM dual ) AS sqs, ( --行政村数（个） SELECT F_GET_XZCSCOUNT(#[orgcode]) FROM dual ) AS xzcs, ( --警务区数（个） SELECT SQJWSS FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb WHERE orgcode = #[orgcode] ) AS jwqs FROM t_common_pcsjbqktjb where orgcode = #[orgcode]

select orgcode,orgname,leve,parent_code,xsajs as xsaj, zaajs as zaaj, qjajs as qjajs,qdajs as qdajs,rsdqajs as rsdqaj, dqjdcajs as dqjdclaj,qtajs as qtaj, jftjs,znsgs from t_tjfx_faqktj t where parent_code=#[orgcode] #if($tjyf && !$tjyf.equals("")) and tjyf=#[tjyf] #end order by orgcode

select orgcode,orgname,leve,parent_code,tjyf,xsajs as xsaj, zaajs as zaaj, qjajs as qjajs,qdajs as qdajs,rsdqajs as rsdqaj, dqjdcajs as dqjdclaj,qtajs as qtaj, jftjs,znsgs from t_tjfx_faqktj t where orgcode=#[orgcode] and tjyf<=#[tjyf] and tjyf>=to_char(add_months(to_date(#[tjyf]||'01','yyyymmdd'),-12),'yyyymm') order by tjyf

select orgid as orgId,orgcode as orgCode,orgname as orgName, parent_orgid as parent_orgid, parent_code as parent_code,orgjc as orgJc,leve as leve from t_common_organization_sjjs where parent_code=#[orgcode] order by orgcode

#if($leve && $leve.equals("4")) select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.ORGCODE=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, czfzs, czwgfs, czwsfs,yczfs, qdzazrzs, ybazs,ycqzs from ( select orgcode, sum(czfzs) as czfzs, sum(czwgfs) as czwgfs, sum(czwsfs) as czwsfs, sum(yczfs) as yczfs, sum(qdzazrzs) as qdzazrzs, sum(ybazs) as ybazs, sum(ycqzs) as ycqzs from t_tjfx_czfwtjbb where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=substr(#[orgcode],1,8)||'3100' group by rollup(orgcode) ) a #else select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.ORGCODE=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, czfzs, czwgfs, czwsfs,yczfs, qdzazrzs, ybazs,ycqzs from ( select orgcode, sum(czfzs) as czfzs, sum(czwgfs) as czwgfs, sum(czwsfs) as czwsfs, sum(yczfs) as yczfs, sum(qdzazrzs) as qdzazrzs, sum(ybazs) as ybazs, sum(ycqzs) as ycqzs from t_tjfx_czfwtjbb where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=#[orgcode] group by rollup(orgcode) ) a #end

#if($leve && $leve.equals("4")) select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, ldrkzs, ldrknans, ldrknvs,ybjzzs, ylfns from ( select orgcode, sum(ldrkzs) as ldrkzs, sum(ldrknans) as ldrknans, sum(ldrknvs) as ldrknvs, sum(ybjzzs) as ybjzzs, sum(ylfns) as ylfns from t_tjfx_lrdktjbb where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=substr(#[orgcode],1,8)||'3100' group by rollup(orgcode) ) a order by a.orgcode #else select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, ldrkzs, ldrknans, ldrknvs,ybjzzs, ylfns from ( select orgcode, sum(ldrkzs) as ldrkzs, sum(ldrknans) as ldrknans, sum(ldrknvs) as ldrknvs, sum(ybjzzs) as ybjzzs, sum(ylfns) as ylfns from t_tjfx_lrdktjbb where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=#[orgcode] group by rollup(orgcode) ) a order by a.orgcode #end

select nvl(jzsydm,'00') as jzsydm, nvl(jzsymc,'合计') as jzsymc, xbmnum, xbwnum, njzqxbnyxnum, njzqxbnzwnnum, njzqxwnys, hjdlxsns, hjdlxsnx, hjdlxsws, hjdlxswx, hjdlxgat, hjdlxgw, hjdlxqt, zzcslj, zzcsjmjz, zzcsdwnb, zzcsgdxc, zzcszlfw, zzcsqt from ( select neworgcode as orgcode, tjyf,jzsydm, jzsymc, nvl(sum(xbmnum),0) as xbmnum, nvl(sum(xbwnum),0) as xbwnum, nvl(sum(njzqxbnyxnum),0) as njzqxbnyxnum, nvl(sum(njzqxbnzwnnum),0) as njzqxbnzwnnum, nvl(sum(njzqxwnys),0) as njzqxwnys, nvl(sum(hjdlxsns),0) as hjdlxsns, nvl(sum(hjdlxsnx),0) as hjdlxsnx, nvl(sum(hjdlxsws),0) as hjdlxsws, nvl(sum(hjdlxswx),0) as hjdlxswx, nvl(sum(hjdlxgat),0) as hjdlxgat, nvl(sum(hjdlxgw),0) as hjdlxgw, nvl(sum(hjdlxqt),0) as hjdlxqt, nvl(sum(zzcslj),0) as zzcslj, nvl(sum(zzcsjmjz),0) as zzcsjmjz, nvl(sum(zzcsdwnb),0) as zzcsdwnb, nvl(sum(zzcsgdxc),0) as zzcsgdxc, nvl(sum(zzcszlfw),0) as zzcszlfw, nvl(sum(zzcsqt),0) as zzcsqt, grouping(neworgcode)||grouping(tjyf)||grouping(jzsydm)||grouping(jzsymc) as gp from ( select rpad(substr(t.orgcode,1,2*f_get_dwleve(#[orgcode])),12,'0') as neworgcode, tjyf, jzsydm, jzsymc, xbmnum, xbwnum, njzqxbnyxnum, njzqxbnzwnnum, njzqxwnys, hjdlxsns, hjdlxsnx, hjdlxsws, hjdlxswx, hjdlxgat, hjdlxgw, hjdlxqt, zzcslj, zzcsjmjz, zzcsdwnb, zzcsgdxc, zzcszlfw, zzcsqt from t_tjfx_zzrktjbb t where tjyf=#[tjyf] and orgcode like substr(#[orgcode],1,2*f_get_dwleve(#[orgcode]))||'%' ) a group by rollup(neworgcode,tjyf,jzsydm,jzsymc) ) b where b.gp='0000' or b.gp='1111'

#if($leve && $leve.equals("4")) select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode, f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, ldrkzs, zbzs, bsbzrs,wsbzrs, nanbzrs,nvbzrs,fzs,ysbls from ( select orgcode, sum(ldrkzs) as ldrkzs, sum(zbzs) as zbzs, sum(bsbzrs) as bsbzrs, sum(wsbzrs) as wsbzrs, sum(nanbzrs) as nanbzrs, sum(nvbzrs) as nvbzrs, sum(fzs) as fzs, sum(ysbls) as ysbls from t_tjfx_jzztjbb t where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=substr(#[orgcode],1,8)||'3100' group by rollup(orgcode) ) a order by a.orgcode #else select nvl(orgcode,'999999999999') as orgcode, f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, nvl((select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs s where s.orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, ldrkzs, zbzs, bsbzrs,wsbzrs, nanbzrs,nvbzrs,fzs,ysbls from( select orgcode, nvl(sum(ldrkzs),0) as ldrkzs, nvl(sum(zbzs),0) as zbzs, nvl(sum(bsbzrs),0) as bsbzrs, nvl(sum(wsbzrs),0) as wsbzrs, nvl(sum(nanbzrs),0) as nanbzrs, nvl(sum(nvbzrs),0) as nvbzrs, nvl(sum(fzs),0) as fzs, nvl(sum(ysbls),0) as ysbls from t_tjfx_jzztjbb t where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<#[tjjzrq] and parent_code=#[orgcode] group by rollup(orgcode) ) a order by a.orgcode #end

select a.*,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve, (select orgname from v_common_organization where orgcode=a.orgcode) as orgname, rank() over (order by zs desc) as sort from ( select orgcode,sum(zs) as zs, sum(czrks) as czrks, sum(ldrks) as ldrks, sum(jzrks) as jzrks, sum(wlhrks) as wlhrks, sum(cyrys) as cyrys, sum(sydws) as sydws, sum(stxxs) as stxxs, sum(fwxxs) as fwxxs from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where tjrq>=#[tjqsrq] and tjrq<=#[tjjzrq] and leve=#[dwlx] and parent_code like substr(#[orgcode],1,2*#[leve])||'%' group by orgcode ) a

#if($leve && $leve.equals("5")) select orgcode,orgname,leve, zs, thjcs, gcjcs, nbjcs, wxpjcs, wbjcs, swjcs, lgjcs, ksjcs, spjcs, wljcs, qtjcs, jclbzjcs, xfjcs, aqjcs, yzgqks, wzgqks, fxwts, jgs, fks, xfyhtzs, dxxkzs, qts from t_tjfx_dwaqjctjbb where orgcode=#[orgcode] #elseif($leve && $leve.equals("4")) select a.*,nvl((select orgname from v_common_organization where orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname,f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve from ( select orgcode, sum(zs) as zs, sum(thjcs) as thjcs, sum(gcjcs) as gcjcs, sum(nbjcs) as nbjcs, sum(wxpjcs) as wxpjcs, sum(wbjcs) as wbjcs, sum(swjcs) as swjcs, sum(lgjcs) as lgjcs, sum(ksjcs) as ksjcs, sum(spjcs) as spjcs, sum(wljcs) as wljcs, sum(qtjcs) as qtjcs, sum(jclbzjcs) as jclbzjcs, sum(xfjcs) as xfjcs, sum(aqjcs) as aqjcs, sum(yzgqks) as yzgqks, sum(wzgqks) as wzgqks, sum(fxwts) as fxwts, sum(jgs) as jgs, sum(fks) as fks, sum(xfyhtzs) as xfyhtzs, sum(dxxkzs) as dxxkzs, sum(qts) as qts from t_tjfx_dwaqjctjbb where orgcode like substr(#[orgcode],1,8)||'%' group by rollup(orgcode) ) a #elseif ($leve && $leve.equals("3")) select a.*, nvl((select orgname from v_common_organization where orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve from ( select rpad(substr(orgcode,1,8),12,'0') as orgcode, sum(zs) as zs, sum(thjcs) as thjcs, sum(gcjcs) as gcjcs, sum(nbjcs) as nbjcs, sum(wxpjcs) as wxpjcs, sum(wbjcs) as wbjcs, sum(swjcs) as swjcs, sum(lgjcs) as lgjcs, sum(ksjcs) as ksjcs, sum(spjcs) as spjcs, sum(wljcs) as wljcs, sum(qtjcs) as qtjcs, sum(jclbzjcs) as jclbzjcs, sum(xfjcs) as xfjcs, sum(aqjcs) as aqjcs, sum(yzgqks) as yzgqks, sum(wzgqks) as wzgqks, sum(fxwts) as fxwts, sum(jgs) as jgs, sum(fks) as fks, sum(xfyhtzs) as xfyhtzs, sum(dxxkzs) as dxxkzs, sum(qts) as qts from t_tjfx_dwaqjctjbb where orgcode like substr(#[orgcode],1,6)||'%' group by rollup(substr(orgcode,1,8)) ) a #elseif($leve && $leve.equals("2")) select a.*, nvl((select orgname from v_common_organization where orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve from ( select rpad(substr(orgcode,1,6),12,'0') as orgcode, sum(zs) as zs, sum(thjcs) as thjcs, sum(gcjcs) as gcjcs, sum(nbjcs) as nbjcs, sum(wxpjcs) as wxpjcs, sum(wbjcs) as wbjcs, sum(swjcs) as swjcs, sum(lgjcs) as lgjcs, sum(ksjcs) as ksjcs, sum(spjcs) as spjcs, sum(wljcs) as wljcs, sum(qtjcs) as qtjcs, sum(jclbzjcs) as jclbzjcs, sum(xfjcs) as xfjcs, sum(aqjcs) as aqjcs, sum(yzgqks) as yzgqks, sum(wzgqks) as wzgqks, sum(fxwts) as fxwts, sum(jgs) as jgs, sum(fks) as fks, sum(xfyhtzs) as xfyhtzs, sum(dxxkzs) as dxxkzs, sum(qts) as qts from t_tjfx_dwaqjctjbb where orgcode like substr(#[orgcode],1,4)||'%' group by rollup(substr(orgcode,1,6)) ) a #elseif($leve && $leve.equals("1")) select a.*, nvl((select orgname from v_common_organization where orgcode=a.orgcode),'合计') as orgname, f_get_dwleve(a.orgcode) as leve from ( select rpad(substr(orgcode,1,4),12,'0') as orgcode, sum(zs) as zs, sum(thjcs) as thjcs, sum(gcjcs) as gcjcs, sum(nbjcs) as nbjcs, sum(wxpjcs) as wxpjcs, sum(wbjcs) as wbjcs, sum(swjcs) as swjcs, sum(lgjcs) as lgjcs, sum(ksjcs) as ksjcs, sum(spjcs) as spjcs, sum(wljcs) as wljcs, sum(qtjcs) as qtjcs, sum(jclbzjcs) as jclbzjcs, sum(xfjcs) as xfjcs, sum(aqjcs) as aqjcs, sum(yzgqks) as yzgqks, sum(wzgqks) as wzgqks, sum(fxwts) as fxwts, sum(jgs) as jgs, sum(fks) as fks, sum(xfyhtzs) as xfyhtzs, sum(dxxkzs) as dxxkzs, sum(qts) as qts from t_tjfx_dwaqjctjbb where orgcode like substr(#[orgcode],1,2)||'%' group by rollup(substr(orgcode,1,4)) ) a #end

select orgcode as dwdm, sum(nvl(tzhy, 0)) as tzhy, sum(nvl(tzhy, 0)) as tzhy, sum(nvl(ggcs, 0)) as ggcs, sum(nvl(nbdw, 0)) as nbdw, sum(nvl(wbdw, 0)) as wbdw, sum(nvl(wb, 0)) as wb, sum(nvl(swdw, 0)) as swdw, sum(nvl(lg, 0)) as lg, sum(nvl(ksdw, 0)) as ksdw, sum(nvl(jfdw, 0)) as jfdw, sum(nvl(qtdw, 0)) as qtdw, sum(nvl(sp, 0)) as sp, sum(nvl(wldw, 0)) as wldw, sum(nvl(ddh, 0)) as ddh, sum(nvl(pmh, 0)) as pmh, sum(nvl(qtth, 0)) as qtth, sum(nvl(zs, 0)) as zs from v_common_organization org, (select #if($leve == 1) substr(dwdm, 1, 4) as dwdm, #elseif($leve == 2) substr(dwdm, 1, 6) as dwdm, #elseif($leve == 3) substr(dwdm, 1, 8) as dwdm, #elseif($leve == 4 || $leve == 5) dwdm, #end nvl(sum(a.tzhy), 0) as tzhy, nvl(sum(a.ggcs), 0) as ggcs, nvl(sum(a.nbdw), 0) as nbdw, nvl(sum(a.wbdw), 0) as wbdw, nvl(sum(a.wb), 0) as wb, nvl(sum(a.swdw), 0) as swdw, nvl(sum(a.lg), 0) as lg, nvl(sum(a.ksdw), 0) as ksdw, nvl(sum(a.jfdw), 0) as jfdw, nvl(sum(a.qtdw), 0) as qtdw, nvl(sum(a.sp), 0) as sp, nvl(sum(a.wldw), 0) as wldw, nvl(sum(a.ddh), 0) as ddh, nvl(sum(a.pmh), 0) as pmh, nvl(sum(a.qtth), 0) as qtth, nvl(sum(a.zs), 0) as zs from t_tjfx_dwtj a where 1 = 1 #if($tjsj_start && !$tjsj_start.equals("")) and trunc(tjsj_e,'dd') >= to_date(#[tjsj_start],'yyyy-mm-dd') #end #if($tjsj_end && !$tjsj_end.equals("")) and trunc(tjsj_e,'dd') <= to_date(#[tjsj_end],'yyyy-mm-dd') #end #if($leve == 1) group by substr(dwdm, 1, 4) #elseif($leve == 2) group by substr(dwdm, 1, 6) #elseif($leve == 3) group by substr(dwdm, 1, 8) #elseif($leve == 4 || $leve == 5) group by dwdm #end ) dwtj where 1 = 1 #if($leve == 1) and substr(org.orgcode, 1, 4) = dwtj.dwdm(+) #elseif($leve == 2) and substr(org.orgcode, 1, 6) = dwtj.dwdm(+) #elseif($leve == 3) and substr(org.orgcode, 1, 8) = dwtj.dwdm(+) #elseif($leve == 4 || $leve == 5) and org.orgcode = dwtj.dwdm(+) #end and org.isyx = '1' #if($leve < 5) and org.leve = (#[leve] + 1) #else and org.leve = 5 #end #if($leve == 1) and orgcode like substr(#[dwdm],1,2)||'__00000000%' #elseif($leve == 2) and orgcode like substr(#[dwdm],1,4)||'__000000%' #elseif($leve == 3) and orgcode like substr(#[dwdm],1,6)||'__0000%' and ispcs = '1' #elseif($leve == 4 ) and orgcode like substr(#[dwdm],1,8)||'31__%' #elseif($leve == 5) and orgcode = #[dwdm] #end group by rollup(org.orgcode) order by org.orgcode

select b.* from ( select a.orgcode,a.orgname,a.tjyf, xsajs as xsaj, zaajs as zaaj, qjajs as qjajs,qdajs as qdajs,rsdqajs as rsdqaj, dqjdcajs as dqjdclaj,qtajs as qtaj,jftjs,znsgs,rownum as num from ( select t.* from t_tjfx_faqktj t where orgcode=#[orgcode] and tjyf<=#[tjyf] order by tjyf desc ) a ) b where b.num < 12

select #if($tjlb && $tjlb.equals("2")) rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,4),12,'0') orgcode, (select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs where orgcode=rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,4),12,'0')) as orgname, #elseif($tjlb && $tjlb.equals("3")) rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,6),12,'0') orgcode, (select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs where orgcode=rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,6),12,'0')) as orgname, #elseif($tjlb && $tjlb.equals("4")) rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,8),12,'0') orgcode, (select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs where orgcode=rpad(substr(b.orgcode,1,8),12,'0')) as orgname, #elseif($tjlb && $tjlb.equals("5")) b.orgcode, (select orgname from t_common_organization_sjjs where orgcode=b.orgcode) as orgname, #end sum(jwqzs) as jwqzs, sum(firstweek) as firstweek, sum(secondweek) as secondweek, sum(thirdweek) as thirdweek, sum(fourthweek) as fourthweek, sum(fifthweek) as fifthweek, sum(sixthweek) as sixthweek, sum(wwczcjsjwqs) as wwczcjsjwqs from ( select a.orgcode, nvl((select SQJWSS from t_common_pcsjbqktjb where orgcode = rpad(a.orgcode, 12, '0')), 1) as jwqzs, a.firstweek,a.secondweek,a.thirdweek,a.fourthweek,a.fifthweek,a.sixthweek, (case when ((firstweekisvalid='1' and firstweek=0) or (secondweekisvalid='1' and secondweek=0) or (thirdweekisvalid='1' and thirdweek=0) or (fourthweekisvalid='1' and fourthweek=0) or (fifthweekisvalid='1' and fifthweek=0) or (sixthweekisvalid='1' and sixthweek=0)) then 1 else 0 end) as wwczcjsjwqs from ( select s.orgcode, ( select nvl(sum(zs),0) from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where orgcode=s.orgcode and tjrq>=#[onestart] and tjrq<=#[oneend] )as firstweek, ( select nvl(sum(zs),0) from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where orgcode=s.orgcode and tjrq>=#[twostart] and tjrq<=#[twoend] ) as secondweek, ( select nvl(sum(zs),0) from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where orgcode=s.orgcode and tjrq>=#[threestart] and tjrq<=#[threeend] ) as thirdweek, ( select nvl(sum(zs),0) from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where orgcode=s.orgcode and tjrq>=#[fourstart] and tjrq<=#[fourend] ) as fourthweek, #if($fivestart && !$fivestart.equals("")) ( select nvl(sum(zs),0) from t_tjfx_dwdaysjltjbb where orgcode=s.orgcode and tjrq>=#[fivestart] and tjrq<=#[fiveend] ) as fifthweek, #else 0 as fifthweek, #end
